caption.center: PORTO RICAN AMERICAN TOBACCO CO., PROSECUTOR, v. ESSEX COUNTY BOARD OF

opinion.panel: Before Justices PARKER, BODINE and PERSKIE.
opinion.attorneys:
For the prosecutor, Edward E. Barker.
For the defendants, James F.X. O'Brien.
opinion.opinion_text: The judgment under review will be set aside for the reasons stated in Duke Power Co. v. The Essex County Board of Taxationand the City of Newark, 122 N.J.L. 589.Page 596
